biotools.summary: Auto-CORPus (Automated and Consistent Outputs from Research Publications) is a automated pipeline that cleans HTML files from biomedical literature. The output is a single JSON file that contains the text for each section, table data in machine-readable format and lists of phenotypes and abbreviations found in the article.

bioschemas.name: Auto-CORPus
